\name{view_static}
\alias{view_static}
\title{Keep a fixed view that include all of the data}
\usage{
view_static()
}
\description{
This view keeps positional scales fixed across all frames
}
\seealso{
Other views: \code{\link{view_follow}},
  \code{\link{view_step}}, \code{\link{view_zoom}}
}
\concept{views}
